trans-unit.source: Defines the identity permission for the Web site from which the code originates.
trans-unit.target: 为代码所源自的网站定义标识权限。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Using this class, it is possible to ensure that callers are from a specific Web site.
trans-unit.target: 使用此类，可确保调用方从特定网站。

trans-unit.source: Site identity is only defined for code from URLs with the protocols of HTTP, HTTPS, and FTP.
trans-unit.target: 仅为从 Url 的 HTTP、 HTTPS 和 FTP 协议使用的代码定义站点标识。

trans-unit.source: A site is the string between the "//" after the protocol of a URL and the following "/", if present, for example, www.fourthcoffee.com in the URL http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm.
trans-unit.target: 站点是之间的字符串"/ /"后的 URL 和以下协议"/"，如果存在，例如，在 URL 中的 www.fourthcoffee.com http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm。

trans-unit.source: This excludes port numbers.
trans-unit.target: 这不包括端口号。

trans-unit.source: If a given URL is http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/, the site is www.fourthcoffee.com, not www.fourthcoffee.com:8000.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的 url http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/，站点是 www.fourthcoffee.com，不 www.fourthcoffee.com:8000。

trans-unit.source: Sites can be matched exactly, or by a wildcard ("*") prefix at the dot delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 站点可以完全匹配，或由通配符匹配 ("*") 在点分隔符处的前缀。

trans-unit.source: For example, the site name string *.fourthcoffee.com matches fourthcoffee.com as well as www.fourthcoffee.com. Without a wildcard, the site name must be a precise match.
trans-unit.target: 例如，站点名称字符串 *。 fourthcoffee.com 匹配 fourthcoffee.com，以及 www.fourthcoffee.com。如果没有通配符，站点名称必须是精确的匹配项。

trans-unit.source: The site name string * will match any site, but will not match code that has no site evidence.
trans-unit.target: 站点名称字符串 * 将匹配任何站点，但将与无站点证据的代码不匹配。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], identity permissions are not used.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，不使用标识权限。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective, even when the calling assembly is fully trusted.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，对标识权限的要求是有效，调用程序集是完全受信任时也如此。

trans-unit.source: That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria.
trans-unit.target: 即，尽管调用程序集具有完全信任，则将失败标识权限的要求，如果程序集不符合要求的条件。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust.
trans-unit.target: 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，标识权限的需求较为低效如果调用程序集具有完全信任权限。

trans-unit.source: This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case.
trans-unit.target: 这可确保对所有其他权限，消除标识权限的处理方式的一致性。

trans-unit.source: In versions of the .NET Framework before the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], you could use the <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to prevent inadvertent access to system resources by trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 在之前的.NET framework 的版本[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，你可以使用<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以防止对系统资源的受信任的代码的意外访问。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A> is now obsolete, and access to resources is now determined solely by the granted permission set for an assembly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A> 现已过时，并对资源的访问现在只能由程序集的授予权限来决定。

trans-unit.source: To limit access to files, you must run partially trusted code in a sandbox and assign it permissions only to resources that the code is allowed to access.
trans-unit.target: 若要限制对文件的访问，必须在沙盒中运行部分受信任的代码，并将其分配仅对允许代码访问的资源的权限。

trans-unit.source: For information about running an application in a sandbox, see [How to: Run Partially Trusted Code in a Sandbox](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关在沙盒中运行应用程序的信息，请参阅[如何： 运行部分受信任的代码在沙盒中](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md)。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, identity permissions cannot have an <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted> permission state value.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，标识权限不能有<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>权限状态值。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, identity permissions can have any permission state value.
trans-unit.target: 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，标识权限可以具有任何权限状态值。

trans-unit.source: This means that in 2.0 and later versions, identity permissions have the same behavior as permissions that implement the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission> interface.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，在 2.0 及更高版本中，标识权限具有相同的行为实现的权限<xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission>接口。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SiteIdentityPermission" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SiteIdentityPermission" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SiteIdentityPermission" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SiteIdentityPermission" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The fully restricted state of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SiteIdentityPermission> matches no sites.
trans-unit.target: 完全受限制的状态<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SiteIdentityPermission>不匹配任何站点。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is included for consistency with the design of other permissions, but is not useful in practice.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数包含针对与具有其他权限，设计的一致性，但并不十分有用的做法。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, identity permissions cannot have an <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted> permission state value.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，标识权限不能有<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>权限状态值。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, identity permissions can have any permission state value.
trans-unit.target: 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，标识权限可以具有任何权限状态值。

trans-unit.source: This means that in 2.0 and later versions, identity permissions have the same behavior as permissions that implement the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission> interface.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，在 2.0 及更高版本中，标识权限具有相同的行为实现的权限<xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission>接口。

trans-unit.source: That is, a demand for an identity always succeeds, regardless of the identity of the assembly, if the assembly has been granted full trust.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，要求的标识始终成功，而不考虑程序集，标识程序集已被授予完全信任。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective, even when the calling assembly is fully trusted.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，对标识权限的要求是有效，调用程序集是完全受信任时也如此。

trans-unit.source: That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria.
trans-unit.target: 即，尽管调用程序集具有完全信任，则将失败标识权限的要求，如果程序集不符合要求的条件。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust.
trans-unit.target: 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，标识权限的需求较为低效如果调用程序集具有完全信任权限。

trans-unit.source: This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case.
trans-unit.target: 这可确保对所有其他权限，消除标识权限的处理方式的一致性。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="state" /> parameter is not a valid value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="state" /> 参数不是 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> 的有效值。

trans-unit.source: The site name or wildcard expression.
trans-unit.target: 站点名称或通配符表达式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SiteIdentityPermission" /> class to represent the specified site identity.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SiteIdentityPermission" /> 类的新实例，以表示指定的站点标识。

trans-unit.source: Site identity is only defined for code from URLs with the protocols of HTTP, HTTPS, and FTP.
trans-unit.target: 仅为从 Url 的 HTTP、 HTTPS 和 FTP 协议使用的代码定义站点标识。

trans-unit.source: A site is the string between the "//" after the protocol of a URL and the following "/", if present, for example, www.fourthcoffee.com in the URL http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/.
trans-unit.target: 站点是之间的字符串"/ /"后的 URL 和以下协议"/"，如果存在，例如，在 URL 中的 www.fourthcoffee.com http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/。

trans-unit.source: This excludes port numbers.
trans-unit.target: 这不包括端口号。

trans-unit.source: If a given URL is http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/, the site is www.fourthcoffee.com, not www.fourthcoffee.com:8000.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的 url http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/，站点是 www.fourthcoffee.com，不 www.fourthcoffee.com:8000。

trans-unit.source: Sites can be matched exactly, or by a wildcard ("*") prefix at the dot delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 站点可以完全匹配，或由通配符匹配 ("*") 在点分隔符处的前缀。

trans-unit.source: For example, the site name string *.fourthcoffee.com matches fourthcoffee.com as well as www.fourthcoffee.com. Without a wildcard, the site name must be a precise match.
trans-unit.target: 例如，站点名称字符串 *。 fourthcoffee.com 匹配 fourthcoffee.com，以及 www.fourthcoffee.com。如果没有通配符，站点名称必须是精确的匹配项。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="site" /> parameter is not a valid string, or does not match a valid wildcard site name.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="site" /> 参数不是有效的字符串，也不与有效的通配符站点名称匹配。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回当前权限的相同副本。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 当前权限的副本。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the permission represents the same access to resources or the same site identity as the original permission.
trans-unit.target: 一份权限表示对资源或与原始权限相同的站点标识相同的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the permission.
trans-unit.target: 用于重新构造权限的 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a permission with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 从 XML 编码重新构造具有指定状态的权限。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="esd" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="esd" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="esd" /> parameter is not a valid permission element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="esd" /> 参数不是有效的权限元素。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="esd" /> parameter's version number is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="esd" /> 参数的版本号无效。

trans-unit.source: A permission to intersect with the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前权限相交的权限。

trans-unit.source: It must be of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的交集。

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前权限和指定权限的交集的一个新权限。

trans-unit.source: This new permission is <see langword="null" /> if the intersection is empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果交集为空，则此新权限为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the sites they both describe in common.
trans-unit.target: 以下两个权限的交集是描述它们都描述了在常见的站点的权限。

trans-unit.source: Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection.
trans-unit.target: 仅通过两个原始权限的请求将通过该交集。

trans-unit.source: For example, the intersection of a permission that represents access to www.fourthcoffee.com and one that represents access to *.fourthcoffee.com is a permission that represents access to www.fourthcoffee.com.
trans-unit.target: 例如，表示对 www.fourthcoffee.com，另一个访问权限表示对访问权限的交集 *。 fourthcoffee.com 是表示对 www.fourthcoffee.com 访问权限的权限。

trans-unit.source: The intersection of two identical site identity permissions is the same permission.
trans-unit.target: 两个相同的站点标识权限的交集是相同的权限。

trans-unit.source: The intersection of two different (not wildcard) expressions is an empty permission.
trans-unit.target: （不是通配符） 的两个不同的交集表达式是空的权限。

trans-unit.source: The intersection of a wildcard expression and a matching site is the site.
trans-unit.target: 通配符表达式和匹配的站点的交集是站点。

trans-unit.source: The intersection of two wildcard expressions that match is the longer, more specific of the two expressions.
trans-unit.target: 两个匹配的通配符表达式的交集是更长的时间，更具体的两个表达式。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> parameter is not <see langword="null" /> and is not of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 参数不是 <see langword="null" />，而且与当前权限不是同一类型。

trans-unit.source: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.
trans-unit.target: 将要测试子集关系的权限。

trans-unit.source: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 此权限必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 确定当前权限是否为指定权限的子集。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前权限是指定权限的子集，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a site that is wholly contained by the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前权限指定完全包含在指定权限的站点，则当前的权限是指定权限的子集。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the value of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SiteIdentityPermission.IsSubsetOf%2A> for a range of values of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的值<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SiteIdentityPermission.IsSubsetOf%2A>针对当前权限和指定的权限的值的范围。

trans-unit.source: Current Permission
trans-unit.target: 当前权限

trans-unit.source: Specified Permission
trans-unit.target: 指定的权限

trans-unit.source: IsSubsetOf
trans-unit.target: IsSubsetOf

trans-unit.source: www.fourthcoffee.com
trans-unit.target: www.fourthcoffee.com

trans-unit.source: www.fourthcoffee.com
trans-unit.target: www.fourthcoffee.com

trans-unit.source: www.fourthcoffee.com
trans-unit.target: www.fourthcoffee.com

trans-unit.source: www.tailspintoys.com
trans-unit.target: www.tailspintoys.com

trans-unit.source: www.fourthcoffee.com
trans-unit.target: www.fourthcoffee.com

trans-unit.source: *.fourthcoffee.com
trans-unit.target: *.fourthcoffee.com

trans-unit.source: www.fourthcoffee.com
trans-unit.target: www.fourthcoffee.com

trans-unit.source: *.com
trans-unit.target: *.com

trans-unit.source: *.fourthcoffee.com
trans-unit.target: *.fourthcoffee.com

trans-unit.source: www.fourthcoffee.com
trans-unit.target: www.fourthcoffee.com

trans-unit.source: *.fourthcoffee.com
trans-unit.target: *.fourthcoffee.com

trans-unit.source: *.fourthcoffee.com
trans-unit.target: *.fourthcoffee.com

trans-unit.source: *.fourthcoffee.com
trans-unit.target: *.fourthcoffee.com

trans-unit.source: *.com
trans-unit.target: *.com

trans-unit.source: Anything except `None`
trans-unit.target: 除 `None`

trans-unit.source: Anything
trans-unit.target: 任何内容

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> parameter is not <see langword="null" /> and is not of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 参数不是 <see langword="null" />，而且与当前权限不是同一类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current site.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前站点。

trans-unit.source: The current site.
trans-unit.target: 当前站点。

trans-unit.source: Site identity is only defined for code from URLs with the protocols of HTTP, HTTPS, and FTP.
trans-unit.target: 仅为从 Url 的 HTTP、 HTTPS 和 FTP 协议使用的代码定义站点标识。

trans-unit.source: A site is the string between the "//" after the protocol of a URL and the following "/", if present, for example, www.fourthcoffee.com in the URL http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/.
trans-unit.target: 站点是之间的字符串"/ /"后的 URL 和以下协议"/"，如果存在，例如，在 URL 中的 www.fourthcoffee.com http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/。

trans-unit.source: This excludes port numbers.
trans-unit.target: 这不包括端口号。

trans-unit.source: If a given URL is http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/, the site is www.fourthcoffee.com, not www.fourthcoffee.com:8000.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的 url http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/，站点是 www.fourthcoffee.com，不 www.fourthcoffee.com:8000。

trans-unit.source: Sites can be matched exactly, or by a wildcard ("*") prefix at the dot delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 站点可以完全匹配，或由通配符匹配 ("*") 在点分隔符处的前缀。

trans-unit.source: For example, the site name string *.fourthcoffee.com matches fourthcoffee.com as well as www.fourthcoffee.com. Without a wildcard, the site name must be a precise match.
trans-unit.target: 例如，站点名称字符串 *。 fourthcoffee.com 匹配 fourthcoffee.com，以及 www.fourthcoffee.com。如果没有通配符，站点名称必须是精确的匹配项。

trans-unit.source: The site name string * will match any site, but will not match code that has no site evidence.
trans-unit.target: 站点名称字符串 * 将匹配任何站点，但将与无站点证据的代码不匹配。

trans-unit.source: The site identity cannot be retrieved because it has an ambiguous identity.
trans-unit.target: 无法检索站点标识，因为它的标识不明确。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the permission and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 创建权限及其当前状态的 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the permission, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: 权限的 XML 编码，包括任何状态信息。

trans-unit.source: A permission to combine with the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 与当前权限合并的权限。

trans-unit.source: It must be of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的并集。

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 表示同时兼具当前权限和指定权限的新权限。

trans-unit.source: The result of a call to <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SiteIdentityPermission.Union%2A> is a permission that represents all the sites represented by both the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 对的调用结果<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SiteIdentityPermission.Union%2A>是由当前权限和指定的权限表示表示的所有站点的权限。

trans-unit.source: Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.
trans-unit.target: 任何请求都会通过任一权限传递其联合。

trans-unit.source: For example, the union of a permission that represents access to www.fourthcoffee.com and one that represents access to *.fourthcoffee.com is a permission that represents access to *.fourthcoffee.com.
trans-unit.target: 例如，表示对 www.fourthcoffee.com，另一个访问权限表示对访问权限的联合 *。 fourthcoffee.com 是表示对访问权限 *。 fourthcoffee.com。

trans-unit.source: The union of a permission and `null` is the permission that is not `null`.
trans-unit.target: 权限的联合和`null`是不是权限`null`。

trans-unit.source: The union of a permission and a subset of that permission is the permission that contains the subset.
trans-unit.target: 该权限的子集和权限的联合是包含子集的权限。

trans-unit.source: Any other combination results in an <xref:System.ArgumentException> being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 任何其他组合会导致<xref:System.ArgumentException>引发。

trans-unit.source: For example, the union of the site identity www.fourthcoffee.com and the site identity www.tailspintoys.com results in an exception because neither is a subset of the other.
trans-unit.target: 例如，站点标识 www.fourthcoffee.com 站点标识 www.tailspintoys.com 的并集生成的异常因为既不是另一个的子集。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> parameter is not <see langword="null" /> and is not of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 参数不是 <see langword="null" />，而且与当前权限不是同一类型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The permissions are not equal and one is not a subset of the other.
trans-unit.target: 权限不相等且其中一个不是另一个的子集。
